definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
see 網絡語言|网络语言[wang3 luo4 yu3 yan2]

sentences.english: Quite a number of imprecise words are used in our everyday speech.
sentences.chinese: 我们的日常用语中有相当一部分是不确定词。

sentences.english: Only the initial letter in the first word of any complimentary close is capitalized.
sentences.chinese: 任何结尾谦称用语都只大写第一个字的第一个字母。

sentences.english: HHP is a popular online abbreviation for "haha point".
sentences.chinese: HHP是网络流行用语，表示“笑点”的意思。

sentences.english: Not every idiom translates with such ease.
sentences.chinese: 要闹清楚每个习惯用语的意思是不容易的。

sentences.english: Well, partly, no doubt the terms are often used loosely.
sentences.chinese: 无疑，部分是因为这些用语经常用得松松垮垮。
薄利多销〔商店广告用语〕。

sentences.english: And a number of different sports have contributed idioms to the English language.
sentences.chinese: 许多不同的运动都为英语贡献了很多习惯用语。

sentences.english: The paper explores the problems occurring in the existing translation works.
sentences.chinese: 该论文将习用语翻译中出现的问题归纳为三类。

sentences.english: This was originally a term used in the theater.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个源自剧场的惯用语。

sentences.english: I think these slangs are good for expression but should not be used officially.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这些用语有助于表达，但是不应该被正式使用。

sentences.english: And a brief analysis of the pragmatics of language in the principle of cooperation reflected in the ad.
sentences.chinese: 并简要分析了语用学中合作原则在广告用语中的体现。

sentences.english: Try to Remember idioms and sentences with the first calling, make sure to remember deeply.
sentences.chinese: 尽量用第一人称来记习惯用语和句型，以便记忆牢固。

sentences.english: Digital is the buzzword of the moment in communications technology.
sentences.chinese: “数码化”是眼下很时髦的通信技术用语。

sentences.english: Commentary Phraseology is one of the most distinct phraseologies in Chinese language vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 品评用语是汉语言词汇中最具特色的用语之一。

sentences.english: Commentary Phraseology is one of the most distinct phraseologies in Chinese language vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 品评用语是汉语言词汇中最具特色的用语之一。

definition: pet phrase/regularly used expression/manner of speaking
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
vocabulary/list of words (e.g. for language teaching purposes)/word
variant of 詞彙|词汇[ci2 hui4]
